                                                    int index,
                                                    int bufSize,
                                                    java.nio.IntBuffer sizeType)
Overloads glGetActiveVaryingNV.

Overloads glGetActiveVaryingNV. This version returns both size and type in the sizeType buffer (at .position() and .position() + 1).
